title: I got permabanned for an unknown reason and I didn't get an email.
body: I got permabanned and I don't know why because I did nothing wrong. I also didn't get an email.

replies.body: I went ahead and pulled up your account, and it doesn't look like you're permabanned. There was a bit of a suspicious activity, and we want to make sure your account is still safe, so reach out to our account team using the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and you'll be back on the Rift in no time.
